"Having multiple parameters in a Large Language Model (LLM) can provide several benefits. Here are some reasons why having more parameters might be beneficial:

1. **Improved generalization**: With more parameters, the model has a larger capacity to learn from the training data, which can lead to improved generalization on new, unseen data.
